questions.questions: I make noises (like grunts) that I can't stop
Parts of my body jerk again and again, that I can't control
I have bad ideas over and over, that I can't stop
I have to do things in certain order or certain ways (like touching things}
Words come out that I can't stop or control
At times I have the same jerk or twitch over and over
Certain bad words or thoughts keep going through my mind
I have to do exactly the opposite of what I'm told
The same unpleasant or silly thought or picture goes through my mind
I can't control all my movements
I have to do several movements over and over again, in the same order
Bad or swear words come out that I don't mean to say
I feel pressure to talk, shout, or scream
I have ideas that bother me (like germs or like cutting myself)
I do certain things (like jumping or clapping) over and over
I have habits or movements that come out more when I'm nervous
I have to repeat words or phrases over and over
I have to repeat things that 1 hear other people say
I have to make bad gestures (like the finger)
I have to do things I see other people do
